blocks.help_text: Please describe the research question, problem statement, or goal of the study.
Describe the general methodological approach to answering the research question or tackling the problem.
Specify the data processing/analysis steps insofar as they are known.

blocks.display_text: Upload any files or supporting materials
blocks.help_text:
Upload the data request form output pdf file here. 

Also upload any supporting materials that help describe the studiy design, goals, methodology approach, analysis plan, data processing, etc.
